episodes.synopsis: Angelo schemes to get the best birthday gift. / Angelo wants to skip going to the beach. / Angelo and Sherwood try to complete their toy collection.
episodes.title: The Kid Who Has Everything / Zonka's Death March / The Beach / Collect Them All

episodes.synopsis: Manetti gets a crush on Elena. / Sherwood tutors Manetti. / Angelo worries Lola and Sherwood are in love. / Mom invites an artist to stay with them.
episodes.title: Manetti's Crush / Manetti Must Not Fail / Help! My Friends Are Falling in Love! / The Brush Off

episodes.synopsis: Angelo helps Butterfingers woo Monica. / Angelo stages an escape plan for a frog. / Angelo plans a heist of the teachers' confiscated item stash.
episodes.title: A Little Romance / Mission: Frog / USB Mine / School Heist

episodes.synopsis: Angelo helps his sister get a job. / Angelo and Sherwood want to watch a horror movie. / Angelo has almost won his video game. / Peter gets a trumpet.
episodes.title: Working Hard / Scary Movie / Final Countdown / Thar He Blows!

episodes.synopsis: It's Manetti's birthday. / Angelo's father is to speak at school. / Angelo plans a break-in. / Angelo wants to show his homemade film in class.
episodes.title: Yesterbirthday / Career Day / The Break In / Director's Cut

episodes.synopsis: Butterfingers practices basketball. / Angelo tries to put Peter to bed. / Sherwood might be sent to another school. / Angelo forgets an assignment.
episodes.title: One Shot / The Chimp Sleeps Tonight / Savant Idiot / Face the Music

video.title: Angelo La Débrouille
video.synopsis: Charismatic 12-year-old Angelo takes his best buddies Sherwood and Lola on all kinds of misadventures as they plot to escape their responsibilities.
